content: Stay in excellent shape without taking up a rooms-worth of equipment by working out on the stow away exercise furniture. This functional armchair features a hidden compartment that can fold out as an exercise bike or weight bench.

This retro mini console and media player is your one-stop shop for everything from classic gaming to movies and more. It comes with ready-to-play pre-installed games, functions as a living room computer, and can run games from classic systems like Atari and Sega.

Listen to your favorite vinyl anytime and anywhere using nothing more than this portable wooden block record player. Simply place this compact block on top of your record, pull the lever, and the block will begin riding over the record’s surface to play music.

Add an unnecessary step to the way you tell time by hanging The Redundant Clock up on the wall. Instead of conventional numbers, the clock’s 12 inch face displays a series of smaller analog clocks that cleverly display the time of day.

Gain perspective on our insignificance within the infinite cosmos by gazing into this universe in a sphere. Modeled after the Laniakea supercluster, this transparent orb comes adorned with 380,000 laser etched dots that each represent an entire galaxy.

Handle any food-related task on the campsite by packing the Muncher titanium multi-tool spork. Apart from functioning as a sturdy spork, it packs an additional 7 tools into its slim design including a box cutter, can opener, serrated butter knife, and peeler.

Perform a variety of everyday tasks without having to reach into the toolbox by carrying the STK multi-tool. This little titanium tool combines six useful tools including a money clip, pry bar, bit driver, and screwdriver into a compact portable package.

The projection keyboard and piano instantly transforms any flat surface into your personal keyboard. It comes with 4 different language setups including English, Spanish, Arabic, and Chinese and can also be used as a fully functional piano.

Science fiction comes to life for your enjoyment with the Codename Colossus battle robot. This mechanized dieselpunk tank stands 13 inches tall with motorized legs, and comes with a cool hand-painted battle-worn paint scheme that adds to the realism.

Ensure your phone’s always secure and at hand by keeping it safe inside this smartphone holster. It comes with enough storage room to house your phone, keys, cash, and credit cards and can be worn in one of nine different ways.

Add some flair to your next dinner party by serving your soup course using this floating swan ladle. Available in either a black or white model, each ladle is designed to be perfectly balanced so that it floats upright when placed over a large pot of soup.

Capture amazing aerial shots almost anywhere using this flying camera smartphone cover. The patented phone cover houses an easily detachable compact flying camera within that you can easily control with just one hand using the included app.

Make workouts fun by combining them into a challenging and entertaining video game using this interactive core trainer. The platform turns your body into a joystick that lets you control fun mobile games while simultaneously strengthening your core.

Enjoy uninterrupted music while you charge your phone by equipping it with this smartphone headphone adapter. Rather than having to purchase additional dongles, the adapter allows you to simultaneously plug in your headphones and charging cable.

The everyday smart glasses are the discreet and fashionable glasses designed to facilitate your day to day life. It comes with a built-in mic, tracks your activity levels, provides hands-free calling with bone conduction speakers, among many other features.

The days of fumbling through countless remotes are over thanks to the remote for everything. This sleek gadget features a color LCD screen that instantly adapts to the device you point it towards, such as your TV, speakers, lights, thermostat, and much more.

Satisfy your erotic vampire-based fantasies like you never thought possible using this gothic blood lubricant. This odd and kinky lube features a dark red hue to produce a realistic appearance and comes in small glass vials that makes them easy to carry.

This travel gear organizational tarp will ensure you  pack everything you’ll need on your next adventure. This 5′ x 7′ tarp’s surface features an extensive list, broken down into categories like “safety” and “shelter”, along with flex-zones for laying our your gear.

This smart printing spray lets you create jaw-dropping works of art even if you don’t have a single artsy bone in your body. Using your smartphone as a guide, it will release paint in the precise location needed as you hold and move the device across your canvas.

Wake up feeling rested and more energized than ever by improving your sleep patterns using the sleep training alarm clock. It syncs to your playlists so you can wake up to your favorite music, and it limits the number of times you can hit the snooze button.

Instantly create a magical nighttime atmosphere using this real fire tornado lamp. This unique lighting fixture combines nature and modern technology to produce a stunning visual display as the small but majestic fire twister dances gracefully inside the metallic cylinder.

Traveling through busy airports with your little bundle of joy is now a whole lot more convenient with this carry-on pull-out stroller luggage. Apart from ample storage, it offers a comfy pull-out stroller, USB charging ports, and a handy portable changing mat.

Whip up delicious homemade treats in less than ten minutes by baking them in this smart cookie oven. It employs a compact convection fan that blows hot air through special pathways so that the oven heats up  extremely fast, resulting in a faster cooking time.

Let your creativity run wild by building drones capable of aerial stunts using the programmable modular drone. The drone employs drag-and-drop technology do perform amazing tricks in the air while the design lets you assemble it into a variety of different models.

Alkemista is the professional grade all-in-one spirits infusion vessel that enables anyone to craft and serve fresh, custom infused cocktails at home or in a bar — using your very own fresh fruit, spices, herbs and botanicals.

Look as badass as Snake Plissken by accessorizing your outfit using this Escape From New York smartwatch. Inspired by the hit ’80s flick, it displays everything from the time and date to the weather and app and push notifications on its small retro screen.

Turn flat tires into a thing of the past by outfitting your bike with these air-free never flat bicycle tires. Unlike traditional tires, they are made from a special unique polymer blend and outfitted with holes along the sides that provide a comfortable and stable ride.

Unlock all the rich flavors your coffee beans have to offer by preparing your roast using the GINA smart coffee instrument. It pairs with your phone to guide you through the brewing process while allowing you to choose from 3 different brewing techniques.

The world’s lightest electric skateboard lets you effortlessly cruise around without being encumbered by a heavy deck. Weighing just 9.7lbs, this affordable board can reach speeds of 19 miles per hour while traveling distances up to 11 miles on a single charge.

Keep your possessions organized in a visually appealing way by placing them on these modular interactive bookshelves. Each shelf is composed of independent pieces which you can pull down depending on your shelving needs.

titleEN: How To Be A Magician Training Kit
content: Now you can own any room you walk into by dazzling onlookers with incredible tricks. This visual training kit can teach anyone how to to perform tricks like biting a coin in half, making a cigarette vanish, teleporting an item into someone’s hand, and much more!

Keep your things neatly organized without creating an unsightly and uncomfortable bulge in your pocket by using the Ravean functional minimalist wallet. It features an ultra slim profile, RFID blocking, detachable money clip, and room for 12+ cards.

This iPhone charging headphone jack is here to save the day from Apple’s horrendous design decisions in the new iPhone! This compact adapter lets you simultaneously charge your phone while listening to music – groundbreaking.

Avoid clutter in the kitchen by replacing your set of measuring spoons with the 4-in-1 polygon measuring spoon. It lies completely flat when not in use and folds into four distinct sizes, ranging from 1/2 TBSP to 2 TBSPs, depending on where you hold the spoon.

What if you could control your dreams? The Lucid Dreamer is the world’s first reliable lucid dream-inducing device! Using EEG based REM detection, tACS and sound and light stimulation, this wearable device will induce a magical lucid dream experience.

Create a soothing and calm environment in your home using this kinetic art table. Available in a variety of hardwood and veneer exteriors, it comes with at least 25 distinct built-in patterns – selectable via the app – to create eye-catching visual displays in the sand.

Take your auditory experience to the next level by listening to your tunes from these sound smart headphones. They feature an ergonomic design inspired by the human ear, a button-free interface, ambient noise control, and 12 hour battery life.

Visually enhance your auditory experience by playing your vinyl on the levitating turntable. Apart from providing high-quality sound, you can switch between 33-rpm and 45-rpm, while a patented drive system employs magnetic levitation to produce a smooth spin.

Create an inviting nighttime ambiance for your guests with one of these sound reactive fire pits. Available in a range of finishes, styles, and sizes, they’re built with embedded LEDs, Bluetooth speakers, and sound reactive flames.

Get amazing aerial shots without needing a costly drone using this GoPro foam dart. It sports an aerodynamic design that fully encases your GoPro in a padded foam exterior so that you can throw it through the air like a football without damaging your camera.

The cache survival belt is the ultimate accessory for travel and everyday use. Available in either an adventure, essentials, or a minimalist model, the belt is designed with a bevy of features like a concealed 28″ Velcro pocket, paracord gear loops, and a small mirror.

Fill your garage or shed with light using this motion activated garage ceiling light. It screws into the light socket, uses only 25 watts of power, and features 3 adjustable panels that output 3,000 lumens of bright white light.

Quit wasting precious minutes filling out time sheets, simply use this eight sided time tracking device instead! This compact polygon wirelessly connects to your computer and lets you assign a project to each face so that you can track time more efficiently.

Experience your favorite herb like never before by chugging down a couple of these cannabis infused IPA beers. This completely legal brew takes advantage of the antioxidant and neuroprotectant properties of cannabinoids to create a unique rich and sudsy brew.

Become your social circle’s top outdoor cook with this multifunctional grill/griddle/fire pit. This innovative cooking device employs an elevated grate system that you can position over the fire pit base to perform everything from searing to sauteing and boiling.

Usher your home into the future with the BIG-i personalized family robot. This voice programmable natural-interaction robot can move, talk, and do everything from give you daily weather updates to managing your home’s smart appliances.

Make phone calls with your fingertips by outfitting your wristwatch with the fingertip phone call smart watchstrap. You simply place your fingertip over your ear to speak through the embedded microphone which transmits audio clearly without any background noise.

Hide small items in plain sight by stuffing them inside these exotic metal orbs. Available in either stainless steel, titanium, brass, or copper, each orb is precision machined into a perfect sphere which you can unscrew at the middle to reveal a small stash compartment.

Keep your body running at optimum levels by strapping on this wearable hydration monitor. Apart from tracking your body’s hydration levels, it simultaneously monitors your heart rate, activity, sleep, and calories to help you maximize your nutrition.

Play your favorite games all day long without worrying about draining your phone by placing it inside this mobile gaming battery charging case. It comes with a 5200 mAh battery that charges in just 15 minutes and provides up to 33 hours of gaming time.

Move through the water as swiftly as a fish using this modular jet propulsion system. It features an ergonomic handle fitted with a magnetic switch for one-handed control, can be mounted onto kayaks and paddle boards, and can reach a top speed of 7 mph.

Elevate the craftsmanship of your future projects by outfitting your workshop with Wazer, the desktop waterjet cutter. It utilizes a high powered waterjet to cut through any material – such as steel, glass, ceramic, and stone with unmatched precision.

Turn any TV into an all-in-one video conferencing platform using the HELLO communication device. A 4K video sensor and quad-core processor work together alongside 4 smart microphones to provide HQ video and audio.

Help cut costs on your monthly water bill by outfitting your bathroom with this water conserving faucet nozzle. It installs onto your existing tap in seconds and transforms the wasteful stream into a fine mist that utilizes 98% less water than traditional faucets.

Transform your laptop into a top-notch gaming PC using the Wolfe external GPU. It contains a powerful NVIDIA GTX 970 GPU delivers a peak computing power of 3.49 TeraFLOPS so your laptop can handle anything from VR to AAA games.

Stay on top of your nutrition and fitness goals using this calorie intake and fitness tracking ring. While most fitness bands just measure your calories burned, this ring goes one step further by giving you a detailed daily breakdown of the calories you’ve consumed.

Give your next pool day a rocking soundtrack using the Cannonball floating speaker. It provides 360 degree surround sound, can be fully submerged for  30 minutes, and sports a tough rubberized shock absorbing cover that makes it ideal for the outdoors.

Improve your quality of sleep using the room in a room tent. Apart from creating a cozy spot to slumber in, the tent is made from a blackout fabric that blocks out as much as 95% of light and helps keep out cold air, so you can stay warm and toasty inside.

Help keep your ride looking clean on a daily basis by placing this topple proof car trashcan inside. Crafted from 100% recycled plastic, it sports a slim-profile that won’t get in the way and uses two small clips at the base to latch onto the carpet and remain upright.

Turn your home’s plastic waste into beautiful creations using the Renegade 3D printing pen. Rather than relying on pricey proprietary filaments, the Renegade allows you to use empty plastic bottles and bags to create 3D masterpieces.

Avoid your freshly trimmed nail clippings from flying all over the place by using this nail capsule fingernail catcher. After sticking the nail clipper and your finger through the openings at either end, everything you clip off will become trapped inside the clear cylinder.

Defy the laws of gravity next time you want to juice up your smartwatch by placing it on this levitating charger. It features a sleek contemporary design that employs a proprietary induction system to charge your smartwatch as it literally hovers midair.

Turn your fruits into alcohol in just three simple steps using this personalized craft cider machine. After picking your favorite recipe using the app, you simply add the fruits and yeast then press the start button to craft some delicious cider in just one to two weeks.

Ensure your furry friend is at ease by getting them this smart anti-anxiety dog crate. The moment your pooch enters, proximity sensors activate a camera, fan, and a specially curated playlist scientifically proven to calm down canines.

titleEN: Enhanced Field Of View VR Headset
content: Make your virtual reality experience more immersive than ever using the Eyeforce VR headset. It increases your field of vision from the traditional 100 to an incredible 210 degrees, eliminating the black edges along the bilateral parts of your eyes.

The CellRobot modular robot can be assembled into nearly anything you can imagine. The ingenious design of this fun and educational toy lets you put the pieces together in a dozens of various ways to create a unique robot you can control using your smartphone.

Keep your head from bobbing around while you catch some Z’s by holding up your noggin with the head hammock pillow. This soft pillow comes with straps you can easily attach to any headrest in order to keep your head and spine perpendicular while you sleep.

Keep your electronic devices juiced up while you’re in the great outdoors using this portable water powered generator. It’s compact enough to fit in almost any pack and is designed to convert any type of moving water into stored energy.

Transform nearly any chair into a trusty workstation using this standing desk chair attachment. It requires no assembly, comes with a handy phone holder, and can be adjusted in both height and angle so you can work in total comfort.

Now you can project your phone onto a transparent screen on your windshield using Hudly. Compatible with both iOS and Android systems, it installs in three simple steps and is highly visible in all types of lighting thanks to the built-in light sensitivity sensor.

Technology, science, and art combine to create an eye-catching optical illusion in this slow motion picture frame. The frame takes advantage of the limits of human visual perception to make real objects appear to be moving in slow motion.

Stop making excuses and start exercising with the BodyBoss 2.0 portable home gym. Using a specialized platform and resistance bands, you’ll be able to replicate many popular gym exercises – like squats, curls, and bench presses.

Increase your backyard’s comfort levels by growing your own grass chair. Simply assemble the laser-cut cardboard frame, fill in the hollows gaps with tightly packed dirt, place grass seeds all over, and wait for it to grow into a grass mound you can relax on top of.

Stay connected and more productive than ever while getting ready in the mornings with this hands free smart mirror. Apart from your stunning reflection, you’ll be able to view videos, take pictures, play games, and try on virtual accessories and jewelry.

Keep the inside of your fridge organized by installing this Ziploc bag slide-out holder. Designed to fit on either the shelves or fridge door, it swiftly slides out so that you can easily access every bag instantly without having to rummage around.

Make your sandwiches as visually captivating as they are tasty using this app controlled smart image toaster. You can either choose from a collection of templates or create your own design and watch as it’s quickly printed onto your slice of toast.

Get real time weather data sent straight to your smartphone using BloomSky. The specialized Sky2 camera captures HD images every 5 minutes while also providing accurate temperature levels, barometric precipitations, and humidity readings.

Stop losing your possessions while you’re trotting about by placing this global item tracking device inside your luggage. This tiny device fits nearly anywhere and utilizes WiFi, BLE, GSM, and GPS to help you pinpoint your luggage’s location.

Become the envy of all your geeky friends by adding these fantasy gaming coins to your collection. You’ll be able to choose from dozens of pre-made sets or mix-and-match to create your own custom set of incredibly intricate coins.

Stop using slimy bars of soap once and for all by switching over to this refillable soap dispensing loofah. The loofah features a small capsule you can fill with  roughly four ounces of your favorite body wash and release it with a simple squeeze.

Carry every color of the world in your pocket by toting around this customizable color smart pen. With over 16 million possible colors, simply scan the color you want off any object around you and begin writing in that same color or choose one from the app.

Instantly turn any deck into an electric skateboard using this bolt-on electric skateboard motor. This ultra light and compact powertrain kit is compatible with any type of deck and trunks and has a range of fifteen miles with a top speed of twenty-two miles per hour.

Improve your game without needing expensive lessons by walking onto the field wearing these smart golf shoes. They analyze your stance and swing, relaying instant feedback through a mobile app so you can see what needs improvement.

Give your 3D creations incredible vibrancy using this full color blender 3D printer. It sports a rigid metallic frame and works by thrusting separate yellow, black, magenta, cyan, and white filaments into a single hot end – allowing you to print unlimited colors.

Express your style in a visually captivating way by wearing this audio responsive light up band. Apart from allowing you to customize the color scheme, it can pulse to the rhythm of the music, and allows you to send light signals to other friends wearing the band.

Commemorate one of mankind’s greatest achievements in true geeky fashion with this Apollo 11 flight plan re-issue. Every single page and image is reproduced using accurate fonts, colors, spacing, and paper, displaying every detail of the mission.

Improve your online experience without breaking the bank simply by using the Influx WiFi booster. Acting like a powerful WiFi reflector, it cancels out noise while increasing signal strength to parts of your home with weak or non-existent connections.

Defy gravity on a daily basis by charging your smartphone using this levitating wireless charger. It sports a sleek wooden base that utilizes a combination of induction charging and magnetic levitation to make your phone float and rotate as it charges.

Turn your Android into a full fledged laptop for under a hundred dollars! This Android phone powered laptop acts as a shell equipped with a keyboard, a multi-track touch pad, and a screen that you plug your phone into via USB to unleash it’s full computing potential.

Leave your guests in awe as you defy gravity by pouring your drink inside the levitating cup. Simply  place your drink over the metallic base and a system of magnets and an electrical field will suspend and rotate the cup midair.

With these perfect fitting endless battery earbuds you’ll be able to perform all kinds of physical activities without worrying about them ever falling out. They run for 3.5 hours on a full charge and provide crisp HD sound in addition to a built-in microphone for talking.

Go from pitching the yeast to enjoying your first mug in just a week by placing this home beer brewing system on the job. It’s designed to streamline the beer making process, allowing you to work less yet have greater control over the entire fermentation process.

Improve your dining experience by preventing food contamination using this set of elevated titanium silverware. They feature an ergonomically designed  curved shape that keeps the eating end of the utensil elevated when placed flat on any surface.

This roll up toiletries bag is the perfect solution for taking your bathroom essentials on the go. Made from a tough waxed cotton canvas, it features ten pockets of different widths in addition to a zippered compartment great for storing creams and colognes.

Indulge in a little naughtiness without fear of unwanted pregnancies or STDs by playing the OrgasMe card game. Each player in this frisky strategy game uses special action cards to build up their opponent’s arousal levels to try to get them to climax first.

Burn off calories without putting in any hard work by simply slipping into this thin ice weight loss vest. It’s designed to strategically cool parts of the body with high concentrations of thermoreceptors to burn as much as 500 to 1,000 calories a day.

Experience the world around you like never before by viewing it through the lenses of the 360 degree camera drone. Five integrated cameras capture uninterrupted 4K UHD footage that’s internally stitched into a single 360-degree video.

Effortlessly create dynamic lighting effects anywhere in your home using this smart LED strip kit. These water-resistant lights install in seconds and are controlled via a smartphone app that lets you control everything from color scheme to brightness.

Seven year olds don’t need iPhones. This screenless GPS tracker/phone provides kids with a safe way of communicating with parents. This compact device features two way voice calling and GPS capabilities so you’ll always know their whereabouts.

This panic button smart ring allows you to discreetly send out a distress signal without drawing attention to yourself. The ring comes with a small button that alerts your safety circles with your profile info and location when you hold the button down for 3 seconds.
